parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the application group.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the availability monitoring task.

parameters.name: Ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the availability monitoring tasks. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return.

Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: TaskName
parameters.description: The name of the availability monitoring task.
